name: Kumar Shanu
intro: Focused on creating amazing UIs and solving problems to build something cool and useful for the world.
about: I am a full-stack web developer who loves to design and develop beautiful websites. I am learning coding for over a year and enjoying every part of my journey.

projects.name: Urban-Ladder Clone
projects.about: This project is the clone of Urban Ladder(Online furniture shop). The project was built by a team of 4 persons and executed in 5 days.Key features of the project are Signup/Login with email and google, Checkout process including Add to cart, Shipping address form and Payment details.
tech: React, Redux, Context-API, Express, MongoDB, Material UI, Ant Design, Module-CSS

projects.name: Zostel
projects.about: Zostel is one of the largest and oldest networks of hostels and homes in India.

projects.name: Martine.io
projects.about: Martine is a travel purpose website which can be used for booking hotels and events.

projects.name: Greenhouse-clone
projects.about: This project is a clone of a Job searching Website, The project was built in Construct-Week of Unit-2 at Masai School by a team of 3 persons and executed in 6 days. It is a static website.
